title: First League of Fighters actual gameplay from the alpha!
body:
Here is a montage of people playing the alpha of League of Fighters for the first time: http://youtu.be/tr3PUE-_szU?list=UUbgACEGQL2-EZPkLmUKev8Q

We ran a tournament, too! Here is the top 4: http://youtu.be/6r7N79M09_4

And some of the best fighting game players in the world, Chris G (Annie) and Justin Wong (Kennen), played our game for hours. Here is them playing after they learned some combos on their own:
http://youtu.be/MWhLJLBiQQ4


In case you don't know about it you can find more info at Instaburst.net or at our original thread here: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3641012

(just for a preview image lol) http://i.imgur.com/oKzP2Ul.png

replies.body: It blows my mind how far this has come and the sheer scope of the project.

Thanks! To be honest we thought it was a fun project in our downtime from our real jobs... but it kept getting bigger so now its almost a full time job >_< 

But hey people told us they liked our game and they could see themselves playing between queues which is all that really matters to us. When some of the best players in the world told us they liked our game, that was HUGE. Really makes it feel like everything was worth it.
So hyped!!
Awesome :3
More info please, I'm not sure why there are random people like Malphite and Fizz doing ganks.

In the character select screen you can choose your "Call for Gank" which is a champion doing an iconic move as an assist to help you in battle (which also has a CD). 

We added the feature in when we had a ton of animators who wanted to join but didn't have time to animate a full champion.

OH MAN! I have literally been saying I would love a league fighting game and im sad im only just now hearing of this!
Project has my full support in every way, shape, and form :D
Haha thanks! The best way you can support us is subscribe to us on Youtube and show it to all your friends!
